text.autoconfig.mas_config.title: Mas Effects
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.MaceSh: If enabled, creates a shockwave effect when slamming with the mace
Increases the size of the mace shockwave
Sets the opacity of the mace shockwave
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.MaceSp: Creates spark particles when slamming with the mace
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.MaceFl: Creates flash upon slamming with the mace
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.ArmorP: If enabled spawns armor breaking particles when using the breach enchantment
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.Shield: Creates a small shockwave on a playerÂ´s shield when blocking mace attacks
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.Custom: If enabled changes the totem particle effect completely
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.TotemE: Changes the opacity of the totem effect
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.Player: Spawns custom death particles when a player dies
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.PearlT: Makes ender pearls spawn a trail of particles
Sets the opacity of the ender pearl trail particles
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.Custom: Enhances the player and pearl hitboxes when pressing F3+B
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.PearlH: Change the ender pearl hitbox color depending on who threw it
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.PearlW: Players in this list will be considered allies for the following values
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.SelfPe: Color of ender pearl hitboxes thrown by you
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.AllyPe: Color of ender pearl hitboxes thrown by your allies
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.OtherP: Color of ender pearl hitboxes thrown by other players
text.autoconfig.mas_config.option.Hitbox: Distance in blocks where the hitbox starts to fade for mobs and players
Distance in blocks where the hitbox starts to appear for pearls and wind charges
